content.text:
The SPEAKER pro tempore. Will the gentlewoman from Georgia (Ms. 
McKinney) come forward and lead the House in the Pledge of Allegiance.
  Ms. McKINNEY led the Pledge of Allegiance as follows:

       I pledge allegiance to the Flag of the United States of 
     America, and to the Republic for which it stands, one nation 
     under God, indivisible, with liberty and justice for all.
content.speaker: The SPEAKER pro tempore
